about_the_game:
used G**g** translate

What kind of game is this:

"Green Cold Body" is a horror and thriller game with a fictional story. You'll likely see scary scenes close to the screen, dark scenes, and flashing lights.

How you control:

Use the keyboard WASD or the left joystick of the handle to move, the mouse or the right joystick of the handle to control the perspective, and interact according to the scene key prompts.

What you need to do:

-You will play a video blogger, constantly looking for abnormal events in familiar homes.
-If you think everything is fine, you may want to take a second look and then head to your computer to upload the video.
-If you think there is something abnormal, it is recommended not to get any closer, turn around and open the door immediately and leave.
-The clock will represent your progress, and the game will end at a special and meaningful point in time.

If you feel fear (which not really need to be):

Don’t lose your mind, rely on the true love in your heart to dispel the psychological terror you feel.

*The game content and characters are purely fictitious. Any similarity is purely coincidental*

content_descriptors.notes: There are models in the game with slightly exposed clothing

short_description: You will play as a video blogger, surrounded by some kind of terrifying force, still striving to express the Love in your heart. This game can only be played up to 2.5 times.
